name: Departure x And x Friends
summary: Gon must fulfill a promis to Mito-san to take the hunter exam, the hunter candidates encounter problems during the sea voyage to the hunter test site.

name: Test x Of x Tests
summary: Gon searches for a ship to take him to Dolle Island; Leorio saves Gon from falling prey to a trickster.

name: Rivals x For x Survival
summary: Gon Kurapika and Leorio are at the exam site.

name: Hope x And x Ambition
summary: Leorio and Kurapika run together in the first phase of the exam.

name: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky
summary: The participants in the exam emerge from the long tunnel to find themselves in a foggy wetland.

name: A x Surprising x Challenge
summary: Examiners Menchi and Buhara must prepare a dish that will satisfy their Gourmet Hunter palates.

name: Showdown x On The x Airship
summary: Chairman Netero challenges Gon and Killua to a game of skill, which Gon refuses to lose.

name: Decision x By x Majority?
summary: The airship arrives at the site of the third phase. To pass this exam, applicants must reach the base of the tower within 72 hours.

name: Beware x Of x Prisoners
summary: Kurapika makes a discovery about Majitani during their fight that causes him to loose control.

name: Trick x To The x Trick!
summary: A technicality complicates the end of Majitani and Kurapika's fight; Togari confronts Hisoka.

name: Trouble x With The x Gamble
summary: Leorio bets away all of his team's hours; Killua demonstrates his skills in the next match.

name: Last x Test Of x Resolve!
summary: The participants must endure a extended waiting period.

name: Letter x From x Gon
summary: Aunt Mito receives a letter from Gon summarizing his journey so far.

name: Hit x The x Target
summary: As the fourth phase of the exam begins, participants draw random numbers to determine their targets.
